#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	int t,i,n,x,y;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		int a[1005]={0};
		for(i=0;i<n;++i){
			cin>>x;
			a[x]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;++i){
			cin>>x;
			a[x]--;
		}
		int max=0,count=0;
		for(i=0;i<1005;++i){
			count+=a[i];
			if(count>max) max=count;
		}
		cout<<max<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
